Hey everyone! I put Daggers High on Tabletop Simulator recently. I don’t know if this will actually work because I have never used it before, but you can take a look here: https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1631560486

You’ll need to buy Tabletop Simulator, which is $20 off of steam but only like $10 from Humble Bumble right now. Steam also has a lot of 50% off sales for Tabletop Simulator that could be worth waiting for. Anyway, if you have Tabletop Simulator and would like to try playing a game of Daggers High on it, let me know! Thanks.
